meanings.definition: A photograph of celestial objects or phenomena taken with a telescope or camera.
meanings.sent1: I saw an amazing astrophoto of the moon and stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She showed me her collection of astrophotos of distant galaxies.
meanings.sent3: The astrophoto of the shooting star looked like a magical painting.
meanings.sent4: The astrophoto of the comet was a glimpse into the vastness of space.
meanings.sent5: The astrophoto of the nebula was filled with colors and wonder.

meanings.definition: To take photographs of celestial objects or phenomena.
meanings.sent1: He loves to astrophoto the planets and constellations at night.
meanings.sent2: They decided to astrophoto the meteor shower for their project.
meanings.sent3: I will astrophoto the moon tonight if the sky is clear.
meanings.sent4: She astrophotos the stars as a hobby to capture their beauty.
meanings.sent5: Astrophotographing the Milky Way requires patience and skill.
